DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety tolerability balloon venoplasty compare sham Multiple Sclerosis patient Chronic Cerebrospinal Venous Insufficiency ( CCSVI ) measure adverse event occur within 48 week procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Interventional Clinical Trial CCSVI Multiple Sclerosis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Overview study objective : - To determine safety tolerability venoplasty CCSVI Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) . - To determine short term long term impact validate patient measure physician radiologic report MS outcome . - To determine short term long term recurrence rate CCSVI vein treat venoplasty
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis ( RRMS ) Secondary Progressive MS accord McDonald criterion 2010 Age 18 65 year inclusive Neurostatus ( EDSS ) score screen 0 6.5 Fulfill ultrasound criterion CCSVI Previous venoplasty and/or stenting extra cranial venous system
